translations: 存在主义的；有关存在的；存在判断的

phrs.translation: 存在哲学；现代实存哲学

sentences.sentence: Existential questions requiring religious answers still persist.
sentences.translation: 需要宗教解答的生命问题持续存在着。

sentences.sentence: "What if there's nothing left at all?" he cried, lost in some intense existential angst.
sentences.translation: “要是什么都没了会怎样？”他大叫起来，迷失在某种强烈的攸关人类存亡的痛苦中。

sentences.sentence: Scientific publishers routinely report profit margins approaching 40% on their operations at a time when the rest of the publishing industry is in an existential crisis.
sentences.translation: 当其他出版商陷入生存危机之际，科学出版公司的运营利润率却如往常一样接近40%。
